message: Let's start with a fair split, and we can negotiate from here.
You wanted a fair split, but I think I'm worth more than you.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share. Let's meet in the middle.
You're getting greedy, Alice. I'm not budging.
I'm not going to give up. I'm willing to take a slightly smaller share to make sure I get a fair deal.
You're not getting any more generous, Alice. This is my final offer.
I'm not going to let you bully me into a bad deal. I'm willing to walk away if I don't get a better offer.
Fine, I'll meet you halfway. But don't think this is the best I can do.
